name: Colouful Sheep Egg Cup
description:
Fine Bone Egg Cup with illustration of colourful sheep by Mary Kilvert.

Height: 6cm. Diameter: 5cm.

Dishwasher safe.

Shipped in protective packaging.

Free shipping to the UK. 
International shipping £5.

name: Colourful Sheep Cushion - Large
description:
New larger cushion showing colourful flock of sheep illustrated by Mary Kilvert. One of Mary's best selling items this cushion will brighten up any room.

Handmade using beautiful linen and combed cotton mix with a neutral plain linen back, which has a lovely soft feel.

Measures approximately 42cm x 42cm.

Removable cover with hidden white zip.

Filled with soft insert.

Free Shipping in the UK.
International delivery £5.

name: Colourful Sheep Tea Towel
description:
Tea towel showing colourful flock of sheep is now available.

This tea towel would make a lovely gift for a friend or even for yourself and will brighten up any kitchen!

Size: Approx 50cm x 70cm

Material: Linen and cotton mix - printed in the UK. Machine washable.

Each tea towel comes in a cellophane bag.

Free shipping to the UK.

name: Handmade Woolly Sheep - Pearl
description:
This sheeps name is 'Pearl'.
Weight 21 grams.
She likes glow worms.
She dislikes mud.

Lovingly handmade using wool from English Dorset Sheep and comes with it's own unique hand knitted jumper. Measuring approximately 12cm long and 8cm high.

Each sheep comes in a gift box with a certificate of authenticity making them a wonderful and unique gift.

These sheep are made to order and can take time. They should take 3-4 weeks, please email me for a more accurate date. As my sheep are made to order, no two sheep will be exactly the same and may vary.

name: Woolly Sheep - Badges
description:
Woolly sheep set of two badges

Badges measure 2.5cm in diameter

Will make any bag or item of clothing look pretty!

Free shipping to the UK
